                    <script>

                    var VlcookieStatu = false;
                    
                    function vlExintIntentPopUp() {
                        var vlBgEl, vlpopUpEl, vlCloseEl, vlTarget, vlImage, locBody, locPopUp, locTarget;
                    
                        function styleCreator() {
                            var styleEl = document.createElement("style");
                            styleEl.innerHTML = 
                            "#vlBgEl {position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background-color: #000; opacity: 0.5; z-index: 10001}" +
                            "#vlpopUpEl{display:block; position: fixed; width: 500px; height: 500px; left: 50%; top: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(-50%); z-index: 10002;}" +
                            "#vlCloseEl{position: absolute; top: -3%;right: -3%;cursor: pointer;opacity: 1;width: 5% !important;}";
                            document.head.appendChild(styleEl);
                        }
                        styleCreator();
                    
                        if (vlpopUpEl.style.display == 'block') {
                            vlBgEl.style.display = 'inline-block';
                        }
                        document.getElementById("vlCloseEl").addEventListener("click", myClose);
                    
                        function myClose() {
                            vlpopUpEl.style.display = 'none';
                            vlBgEl.style.display = 'none';
                            document.removeEventListener("mouseout", vlExintIntentPopUp);
                        }
                    }
                    
                    function showPopUp(e) {
                        console.log("Y: " + e.clientY);
                        if (e.clientY < 10) {
                            checkCookie();
                            if (VlcookieStatu===true) {
                                console.log("PopUp worked.");
                                vlExintIntentPopUp();
                                document.removeEventListener("mouseout", showPopUp);
                                console.log("Remove worked.");
                            }
                        }
                    }

                    </script>
